rooms.name: Candle Room
rooms.description:
You entered a small room lit only by a small candle hanging from the ceiling.
You can see a single door and a small chair in the dark corner of the room.

items.name: silver ring
items.description: You pick up the silver ring and pocket it.

items.name: small red pebble
items.description: You pick up the small red pebble and pocket it.

items.name: breadcrumb
items.description: You pinch the singular breadcrumb and drop it in your pocket. Why? I have no idea.

rooms.name: Three-door Room
rooms.description:
You fell down a deep hole and are now stuck now a room with three dungeon doors.
You have no choice but explore and try to find your way out.

rooms.name: Dead-end Warning Room
rooms.description:
You enter a room that looks like it was an office of some sort.
The walls are covered with drawings and the table near the door has many burned papers on it.
There's some random items lying around the room.

items.name: burned note
items.description: You pick up a half-burned note with the following message: 'Traveler, ahead is a one-way path with a dead end. Procced wit-.'

items.name: small green pebble
items.description: You pick up the small green pebble and pocket it.

items.name: breadcrumb
items.description: You pinch the singular breadcrumb and drop it in your pocket. Why? I have no idea.

items.name: pentel energel black pen
items.description: This would be a nice addition to Amy's collection. You place it safely in your bag.

items.name: guard key
items.description: This looks like a key to a prison cell. You put it in your pocket.

rooms.name: Wet Room
rooms.description:
You enter and immediately feel the thick air.
You hear the sound of slow dripping water.
A light is coming through the other and spot something shiny in the puddle of water on the floor.

items.name: grimy key
items.description: You slowly reach your hand in puddle to grab the key. You wipe the key dry before putting it into your pocket.

items.name: small blue pebble
items.description: You pick up the small blue pebble and pocket it.

rooms.name: Empty Room
rooms.description: You walk up a stairway and enter a room with nothing in it.

rooms.name: Dim Room
rooms.description: You enter a barely lit room and can't see anything expect for a note on the door at the end of the room.

items.name: warning note
items.description: You grab the note off the door and see the following message: 'Are you sure you want to continue forward?'

rooms.name: Guardroom
rooms.description: You open the door and see an asleep guard sitting in a chair in the corner of the room. You quietly enter.

items.name: small orange pebble
items.description: You pick up the small orange pebble and pocket it.

items.name: guards sandwich
items.description: You steal the guard's sandwhich and save it for later.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description:
After walking up a stairway, you enter a room that looks like it used to be a kitchen.
There's some stuff scattered around and you take a look around.
Strangely, there's a dark gaping hole in the ceiling.

items.name: breadcrumbs
items.description: You sweep the breadcrumbs into your pocket. Why? I have no idea.

items.name: small yellow pebble
items.description: You pick up the small yellow pebble and pocket it.

items.name: rotten eggs
items.description: No, why, stop. You pocket it anyways.

rooms.name: Dark Room
rooms.description: You enter and can't actually see anything but the light coming out from under the door at the other side of the room.

items.name: adventurers note
items.description: You pick up a note from floor and can only make out three words: '... be... careful... end.'

rooms.name: Holding Cell
rooms.description:
After quietly walking past the guard and up the stairs, you see a small cot behind the iron bars with a shiny object on the pillow.
However, the guard woke up and locked you in the room.
You better hope you have a key to *unlock* the door or else you must *restart* the game.

items.name: golden ring
items.description: You pick up the golden ring and pocket it.

items.name: small purple pebble
items.description: You pick up the small purple pebble and pocket it.

items.name: baguette
items.description: The must feed their prisoners well if they get a whole baguette. You save it for later.

items.name: lettuce
items.description: Lett-us leafve. (Let us leave)

requiredItemsToUnlockRoom.name: guard key
requiredItemsToUnlockRoom.description: This looks like a key to a prison cell. You put it in your pocket.

rooms.name: End Room
rooms.description:
You have reached the exit of the dungeon and can see the outside from the door in the front.
However, the door locks behind you.
You better have collected the necessary items to *unlock* and *leave the dungeon* or else you must *restart* the game.

directions.roomName: You have escaped the dungeon! Congratulations!

requiredItemsToUnlockRoom.name: bronze ring
requiredItemsToUnlockRoom.description: You pick up the bronze ring and pocket it.

requiredItemsToUnlockRoom.name: silver ring
requiredItemsToUnlockRoom.description: You pick up the silver ring and pocket it.

requiredItemsToUnlockRoom.name: golden ring
requiredItemsToUnlockRoom.description: You pick up the golden ring and pocket it.

rooms.name: Trap Room
rooms.description:
You enter the room and see that there is a ring hanging on the wall.
However, the door locks behind you.
You better hope you have a key to *unlock* the door or else you must *restart* the game.

items.name: bronze ring
items.description: You pick up the bronze ring and pocket it.

requiredItemsToUnlockRoom.name: grimy key
requiredItemsToUnlockRoom.description: You slowly reach your hand in puddle to grab the key. You wipe the grime off the key before pocketing.

achievements.message: You are a Food Hoarder!!! You collected at least 3 food items throughout your adventure.
You are a Rainbow Rocker!!! You collected all of the colored pebbles!
You are a Wary Traveller!!! You collected all of the items that give you tip.
You are a Stationary Addict!!! You'll pick up any stationary you find... anywhere.
